title: Github Token Leaked publicly for https://github.sc-corp.net
content:

steps: Search for publicly accessible GitHub repositories or code snippets that may contain sensitive tokens.
Identify and verify the leaked token in the code, such as the GitHub token found in the file TopicMatch.py.
vuln_description: A GitHub token was leaked publicly in a code repository, which could potentially be used to gain unauthorized access to GitHub resources. The token was found in a Python script hosted on GitHub, exposing sensitive credentials.
reason: The vulnerability was discovered through simple search and inspection of publicly available code, without requiring complex interactions or manipulation of application states. The discovery process was straightforward and did not involve novel or non-obvious logic.
